alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Sanpete Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 3:18PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sanpete and southeastern Juab Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 318 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ephraim, or 8 miles north of Manti, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moroni, Ephraim, Wales, Fountain Green and Levan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 216 and 219. US Route 89 between mile markers 259 and 264. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
